falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Claim that evidence-only endpoints are sufficient for initial integration
falsificationQueries: Check refactor-everything lab UI home page usage
Check integration_lab_facade tests for experiment/run endpoints
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: The lab home page depends on experiment/run endpoints in addition to evidence windows, and integration tests invoke experiment initialization and run start. An evidence-only facade would not satisfy these callers unless those tests/routes are deferred or trimmed.
